name: Talk Kajal
_source: speak;Kajal;Do you wish to take control of your own fate?
speak;Kajal;The Fates that many worship have deprived us of our ability to control our own lives.
speak;Kajal;But, if you join me, I can show you how to take back control.
speak;Kajal;Lord Vesner once sought to wrest the power of life -
speak;Simon;Uh, we're just looking to get through the swamp.
speak;Kajal;What business do you have there?
speak;Simon;I've heard reports of foul monsters roaming there.
speak;Simon;I'm hoping to do something about it.
speak;Kajal;They are merely intruders whom Lord Vesner gave life anew.
speak;Kajal;But, uh, they're not exactly the most hospitable.
speak;Simon;That's putting it lightly, from what I've heard.
speak;Simon;But, you seem to know a lot about the swamp.
speak;Simon;Think you can help us get through?
speak;Kajal;Only if you promise to hear me out.
speak;Kajal;The swamp and His Lordship may have more to offer you than you think.
speak;Simon;Eh, I suppose it's worth it.
